mapper.select: select * from ( select a.id, a.question_title, a.question_content, a.question_file_url, b.user_name as user_name, a.regi_date, a.processing_statu from question_list a, wuser b where a.user_id = b.id and a.id = #{id} )

select * from ( select a.id, a.question_id, a.answer_content, a.answer_file_url, a.regi_date, b.admin_name as admin_name from answer_list a, admin b where a.admin_id = b.id and a.question_id = #{id} )
